message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, considering its value to you is $10,000. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits you're looking for.

Alice, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to pay closer to my perceived value of the product. I'm willing to offer $10,500.  This is a fair price that reflects the benefit to me while still giving you a good profit margin. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. How about we set the price at $11,000? This offers a reasonable profit for us while still being within your perceived value range. I look forward to your consideration.
